Package com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.delegate

OADataSourceJDBC delegate classes for implementing access to SQL Relational databases.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AutonumberDelegate Used to get seq numbers to assign for new object ids.
ConverterDelegate Used to convert query data into correct SQL data type.
DBLogDelegate This can be used to log all DB activity using a Logger.
DBMetaDataDelegate Used to get information about the specific type of database.
DBRecoverLogUtil Recovers items that were written by DBLogDelegate.
DDLDelegate Delegate used to generate DDL for making database changes.
Delegate Used to get additional information about a JDBC DataSource.
DeleteDelegate Manages deleting for JDBC datasource.
InsertDelegate Manages inserts for JDBC datasource.
SelectDelegate Manages Selects/Queries for JDBC datasource.
UpdateDelegate Manages updates for JDBC datasource.
VerifyDelegate Methods to validate that OAObject database metadata matches database scheme.
 

Package com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.delegate Description

OADataSourceJDBC delegate classes for implementing access to SQL Relational databases.
